oracle.apps.fnd.applcore.visualInformationBuilder.businessRules.publicCommon.core.rules.extension
Interface BusinessRulesExtensionUi

All Known Implementing Classes:
ApprovalsExtensionUiImpl
public interface BusinessRulesExtensionUi

Interface to return the custom Ui elements for an extension.

Method Summary

          Return Ui informations for an action.

Method Detail

getActionUi

ActionUi getActionUi(RuleAction action)
Return Ui informations for an action.

Parameters:
action - action to manage
Returns:
Ui information for the particular action. May return null if the action is not handled by the extension.

isSupported

boolean isSupported(Function function)
Return true if the function is supported by the Extension

Parameters:
function - function to check
Returns:
true if supported.

Return the display name of a function.

Parameters:

Returns:
display name of the function. May return null if the function is not handled by the extension.
